short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will randomly select a TV show or Movie from the Netflix page you're viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of choosing what to watch?

Let Netflix Randomizer choose for you!

github repo: https://github.com/bennyonline/Netflix-Randomiser
